title: And "logging into chat service returns"
body: Everything was working fine and then the next day I cant log into chat service. I have COX if that helps. It is effecting chat in champion select and in game I can type and press enter but no one sees my chat. I have been troubleshooting for a while and I installed The Hextech Repair Tool. I have also tried changing the date and time like everyone says. Nothing is working and I want to play. please help and thank you.

replies.body: I haven't seen any issues with using chat.  Are you still experiencing this issue?  Make sure to go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure all the gears are working properly.  Let me know!
I have done everything now and if I didn't change anything it was because it was already at the suggested settings. so no nothing in that article worked. same issue and this is very annoying

Thanks for troubleshooting!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can take a closer look. I also suggest downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach it to your ticket.  We'll respond asap!
